body: heresy for my nico x maki self but...
Bro even Master Yoda approved this doujin.
also the translator seems like a chill dude. hope he has a great day and keeps up the good work, I look forward to reading more from him in the future

oh, this one's great.  the character expressions are super cute and their reactions and dialogue feels natural and in character.  the translation is also pretty good, reading the panels felt really smooth and not once did I have to reread any text.  there's also quite a few comedic moments in this and none of the jokes missed (favs are the pillow and washing machine sfx).  definitely gonna read this one again in the future
cute doujin it is, and may the force be with you translator
The translater seems like a cool dud
@syeta no problem! Hopefully you enjoyed this doujin and perhaps even my attempt at translating it! ♥️

Hey guys! it's me, the scanlator here. So uhh idk if sites like nhentai update their titles after they have already been uploaded but basically the title from e-hentai also includes "[english] [a123yuri321]" at the end, and the version uploaded here should technically have that as well. so uhh hopefully it will update automatically on nhentai as well.

(Originally upladed at https://e-hentai.org/g/2236136/18dd3bd3f2/)
That's something I was looking for
